properties.entry: SELECT CNTS_NAME , CNTS_DATE , CNTS_URL FROM CONTEST
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ENTRY_LIST JOIN CHALLENGE ON (CHLG_NO = CHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ENTRY_LIST JOIN CHALLENGE ON (CHLG_NO = CHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND CHLG_DATE < SYSDATE
